title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 - Dec 29 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 - Dec 29 2021
description:
EIB Guest Host Michael Berry, "The Czar of Talk" from NewsRadio 740 KTRH in Houston, interviews David Pivtorak of the CRT Attorney Coalition about their latest lawsuit protecting children from hateful indoctrination. Michael goes to the phones to take your calls. A tribute to the late, great Madden, including former NFL QB Dan Pastorini.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
